titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for certain adoption expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/8/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an itemized deduction for qualified adoption expenses, including necessary and reasonable legal costs. Limits such deduction to $2,500. Allows such deduction whether or not a taxpayer itemizes deductions.
